definition[0]: the system of communication that you use to have a conversation with someone in another place
example[0]: Reservations can be made by telephone.
example[1]: I’ve never met him, but I’ve spoken to him on the telephone.
example[2]: I read the names out to him over the telephone.
example[3]: He shouted at me down the telephone.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say phone rather than telephone:
example[4]: She’s been on the phone all evening.
